      • getStockByStore

        void getStockByStore(java.math.BigInteger storeID)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Function to get stock of a specified store
        Parameters:
        storeID - - unique identifier to decide from which store we will get the stock
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Context.clientConsole.handleMessageFromClientUI throws IOException.

      • checkStockByOrder

        Product checkStockByOrder(Order order,
                          Store store)
        Function to check if specific store have the requested products in stock to be able to deliver a specific order
        Parameters:
        order - - order object to identify products to check in store
        store - - store object to identify if in this store have enough products in stock to supply order
        Returns:
        Product - if the store have enough of it in stock
        null - if store doesn't have enough products in stock for this order
